title: screenpipe
description: 24/7 local AI screen & mic recording. Build AI apps that have the full context. Works with Ollama. Alternative to Rewind.ai. Open. Secure. You own your data. Rust.

title: ToolJet
description: Low-code platform for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, Google sheets, OpenAI, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder. Built using JavaScript/TypeScript. ðŸš€

title: CRediT Maker
description: CRedit Maker helps you to create CRediT (Contributor Roles Taxonomy) statements for your research papers. To learn more about CRediT, visit the CRediT website

title: OpenBB
description: The first financial Platform that is free and fully open source.  Offers access to equity, options, crypto, forex, macro economy, fixed income, and more while also offering a broad range of extensions to enhance the user experience according to their needs.  Sign up to the OpenBB Hub to get the most out of the OpenBB ecosystem.
